name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many local residents in Zhejiang also complained in the comments section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplementary video
The police protected the developer, and the people shouted "The police are the people's police, not the developer's police!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A netizen passed by the scene of the incident. At present, the entire building is sealed with iron sheets, including the main gate, four corners, and various entrances and exits. There are security guards at fixed points, especially at the main gate. There are two repeated slogans hung on the iron fence: 1. Resolutely demolish illegal buildings; 
2. The same ruler is used to measure everything, and the method will not break through for anyone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[“June 4th” is once again circulating in an unexpected way inside the wall]
On the evening of September 21, a fan organization said that in the match between Urawa Red Diamonds and Wuhan Three Towns held in Wuhan on September 20, the clothes worn by Japanese fans were printed with “The 101st Division of the Japanese Army that attacked Wuhan that year”.
The news spread quickly on the Internet, but in fact, the pattern on the Japanese fans’ T-shirts was a print created in 2006 based on the photo of the martial law soldiers in Tiananmen Square on June 4th, named “Chinese soldiers”.
In addition, Japanese fans have worn this clothing in many different games. Since Hara’s picture 1 is not from yesterday’s scene, it is currently unclear what the meaning of this pattern is to Japanese fans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @shuqing333 Thanks for the additional information

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of September 21, during the Hangzhou Asian Games football group match between North Korea and Kyrgyzstan, some spectators discovered that the North Korean cheerleaders around them looked like Chinese.
Netizens in the comment area believed that not only did they look like Chinese people, but they did not have the standard North Korean hairstyle and were wearing Apple watches, so they should be college students majoring in Korean in Hangzhou.

On September 22, the relocated households in Li County, Baoding City, Hebei Province, have not received their houses for 10 years.
They took to the streets with banners and marched

content:
On September 22, a student died of overwork during military training at Guangdong University of Technology.
It is said that the student felt unwell in the morning and wanted to rest but was refused by the instructor. He died during physical training in the afternoon.

content:
On September 20, the No. 1 Middle School in Liancheng County, Longyan City, Fujian Province, suddenly changed the school start and end time despite the students' opposition, which caused dissatisfaction among the students.
The students photoshopped the principal into Hitler on the Internet and graffitied "Bald (Principal) Step Down" in the school.

On September 21, Zhejiang University was exposed to another student suicide incident, a student hanged himself to death.
Students lamented: Qiantang River bank is full of singing and dancing, Qizhen Lake is devastated

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, in Hongta District, Yuxi City, Yunnan Province, the district government forcibly demolished a house without any procedures or documents. A 70-year-old woman sat in the ruins under the excavator and cried to defend her rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 22, Professor Xiao Xiurong, a famous expert on the political proposition of the postgraduate entrance examination, published an interpretation of the outline of the political proposition of the postgraduate entrance examination this year.
This year, the newly added "Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era" accounts for 22% of the score, and "An Outline of Mao Zedong Thought and the Theoretical System of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics" has dropped from the original 30% to 13%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, the place where the student jumped from the building at Chengmai Center was filled with tributes from his classmates.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that the deceased had been bullied in school. The deceased's brother was studying in the same school and was threatened by school leaders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 22, an undergraduate student from the Department of Philosophy at Peking University committed suicide by jumping off a building because he was dissatisfied with the result of his admission to graduate school.
It is reported that the student had excellent grades and was the top student in his grade. He wanted to cross majors and be admitted to the School of Law, but was eventually admitted to the School of Marxism. He was dissatisfied with the result and chose to jump off the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, the head teacher of Class 5 of Grade 3 at Shanghai Huashang University of Science and Technology High School beat a student in an art class and threw an easel at the student's face. The teacher who was teaching the class recorded the video and called the police out of fear of an accident, and was fired by the school as a result.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The school held a meeting and said that this was normal educational work and there was nothing wrong with it.
